verbs.description: [V: s] korea last polar bear dies ahead of british retirement the last polar bear kept in south korea has died of old age only weeks before his planned departure to better living conditions in britain korea northern england official masan bear britain polar bear everland seoul tongki international union for conservation of nature yorkshire wildlife park everland theme park south korea afp
